title: motion sense on pixel stand
content:
when opening the "reach to check phone" option in pixel 4 and put the phone to pixel stand to charge, every time after reach to phone and do not unlock the phone the screen will keep on forever.
I have attached a video from the google drive

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Dd_HykeEJnJc3g33O6-OcpBFoTN6PKfi/view?usp=drive_web (reach to check phone issue.mp4)
